summary: Successfully verified DynoPay checkout fixes for unAuthorizedHelper.ts and pages/pay/index.tsx. Both fixes are working correctly - error handling instead of redirects and memo/destination_tag support.
passed_tests: Pay demo page loads successfully (200 status)
unAuthorizedHelper.ts no longer imports Router or calls Router.replace
unAuthorizedHelper.ts throws Error with message instead of redirecting on 403
unAuthorizedHelper.ts still clears token from localStorage on 403
incompletePayment state type includes memo and destination_tag optional fields
setIncompletePayment captures memo/tag/destination_tag/dt from backend response
UI displays memo/tag with data-testid='incomplete-payment-memo' when present
Pay page shows appropriate error message instead of unwanted redirects
No JavaScript errors detected across all pages
